INTERSHOP IOM 5.2.0-SNAPSHOT Database Model   (revision 27f42750ba6a552ca78a274aa0a4757f51559d71)

Table oms.ChargeTypeDefDO (Enum)

List the different charge types available by default.

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id integer PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL  
name varchar(50) NOT_NULL  
description varchar  
chargeType text The string used as default charge identifier within the order API. Can be overwritten in Shop2ChargeTypeDefDO 

[1] Not all references are enforced by a foreign key where they could.
Such "missing" foreign keys are denoted with [[ ]].

[2] Constraints:
PK : the column is part of the primary key
UNIQUE: does don't cover unique constraints and indexes defined on more than one column.

Constraints and Indexes 

Type Name Definition
PRIMARY KEY ChargeTypeDefDO_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) 

Enum Values 

id name description chargeType
1Cod ChargeA charge/fee in case of cash on delivery (COD).CODCHARGE
2Delivery ChargeA charge/fee for transporting or delivery.DELIVERYCHARGE
3Handling ChargeA charge/fee to cover handling costs. E.g. packing, transport, etc. in logistics.HANDLINGCHARGE
4Payment ChargeA charge/fee on payment, also payment process charge. E.g. for transactions.PAYMENTCHARGE
5SurchargeAn extra charge/fee that is added to the regular costs. E.g. for shipping to remote areas.SURCHARGE
